required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Multi-dose, Dose Escalation Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics, and Pharmacodynamics of DDO-3055 Tablets in Patients With Anemia of Non-dialysis Chronic Kidney Diseases.
clinical_study.official_title: A Study on the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Pharmacodynamics of Multi-dose DDO-3055 Tablets in Patients With Anemia of Non-dialysis Chronic Kidney Diseases-Randomized, Double-blind, Dose Escalation, Placebo Controlled Phase I Clinical Trial.

brief_summary.textblock: The study is being conducted to evaluate the safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of multi-dose DDO-3055 tablets in patients with anemia of non-dialysis chronic kidney diseases.

primary_outcome.measure: The incidence and severity of adverse events to assess safety and tolerability.

facility.name: Second Affiliated Hospital of Chongqing Medical University
